parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true">
<entity name="ovs_modes">
<attribute name="ovs_modesid"/>
<attribute name="ovs_name"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<order attribute="ovs_name" descending="false"/>
<link-entity name="ovs_mocregistration_ovs_modes" from="ovs_modesid" to="ovs_modesid" visible="false" intersect="true">
<link-entity name="ovs_mocregistration" from="ovs_mocregistrationid" to="ovs_mocregistrationid" alias="aj">
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="ovs_mocregistrationid" operator="eq"  value="@{outputs('Opeartion_GUID')}"/>
</filter>
</link-entity>
</link-entity>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="ovs_mocregistration">
    <attribute name="ovs_name" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <attribute name="ovs_registrationexpiry" />
    <attribute name="ovs_hubind" />
    <attribute name="ovs_mocregistrationid" />
    <order attribute="ovs_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="ovs_siteid" operator="eq"  value="@{outputs('Site_ID')}" />
      <condition attribute="ovs_operationtype" operator="eq" value="918640038" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="ovs_operationclass">
<attribute name="ovs_operationclassid"/>
<attribute name="ovs_name"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<attribute name="ovs_primeclass"/>

<order attribute="ovs_name" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="ovs_operationclass" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('Opeartion_GUID')}"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="ovs_operationclass">
    <attribute name="ovs_operationclassid" />
    <attribute name="ovs_name" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <order attribute="ovs_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="ovs_primeclass" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('class_list_index')}" />
      <condition attribute="ovs_operationclass" operator="eq" uiname="OP-00001063" uitype="ovs_mocregistration" value="@{outputs('Opeartion_GUID')}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="qm_environmentsettings">
<attribute name="qm_environmentsettingsid"/>
<attribute name="qm_name"/>
<attribute name="qm_value"/>
<order attribute="qm_name" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="qm_name" operator="like" value="%CID[_]%"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="stringmap" >
    <attribute name="attributevalue" />
    <attribute name="attributename" />
    <attribute name="value" />
    <filter>

      <condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="ovs_primeclass" />
     
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="stringmap" >
    <attribute name="attributevalue" />
    <attribute name="attributename" />
    <attribute name="value" />
    <filter>
<condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="ovs_lld_quarter"/>
     
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="stringmap" >
    <attribute name="attributevalue" />
    <attribute name="attributename" />
    <attribute name="value" />
    <filter>
      <condition attribute="objecttypecode" operator="eq" value="10636" />
      <condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="cid_Unitofmeasurement" />
    
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="stringmap" >
    <attribute name="attributevalue" />
    <attribute name="attributename" />
    <attribute name="value" />
    <filter>
      <condition attribute="objecttypecode" operator="eq" value="1" />
      <condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="cid_requirementlevel"/>
     
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="stringmap" >
    <attribute name="attributevalue" />
    <attribute name="attributename" />
    <attribute name="value" />
    <filter>
<condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="ovs_lld_section"/>
     
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="stringmap" >
    <attribute name="attributevalue" />
    <attribute name="attributename" />
    <attribute name="value" />
    <filter>
<condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="ovs_lld_township"/>
     
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="stringmap" >
    <attribute name="attributevalue" />
    <attribute name="attributename" />
    <attribute name="value" />
    <filter>
<condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="ovs_lld_range"/>
     
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="stringmap" >
    <attribute name="attributevalue" />
    <attribute name="attributename" />
    <attribute name="value" />
    <filter>
<condition attribute="attributename" operator="eq" value="ovs_lld_meridian"/>
     
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

parameters.request/subject: The uploaded workbook has been processed successfully
parameters.request/text:
Hi @{outputs('Get_Contact')?['body/firstname']},
The uploaded workbook for @{outputs('Get_Account_Info')?['body/ovs_legalname']}  has been processed successfully:
The following are summary of the upload:
Date of the upload: @{body('Convert_time_zone')}
# Sites in the workbook:@{length(body('List_All_Sites'))}
# UN in the workbook: @{length(body('List_All_UNs'))}
File Name:@{outputs('get_bulk_upload_summary_record')?['body/cid_filename']}

parameters.request/subject: The uploaded workbook has been processed successfully
parameters.request/text:
Salut @{outputs('Get_Contact')?['body/firstname']},
Le classeur import pour @{outputs('Get_Account_Info')?['body/ovs_legalname']} a t trait avec succs :
Voici un rsum du tlchargement :
Date du tlchargement :@{body('Convert_time_zone')}
# Sites dans le classeur :@{length(body('List_All_Sites'))}
# ONU dans le classeur :@{length(body('List_All_UNs'))}
Nom de fichier:@{outputs('get_bulk_upload_summary_record')?['body/cid_filename']}

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="ovs_operationunnumber">
<attribute name="ovs_name"/>
<attribute name="ovs_operationunnumberid"/>
<order attribute="ovs_name" descending="false"/>
<link-entity name="ovs_mocregistration" from="ovs_mocregistrationid" to="ovs_operationunnumber" link-type="inner" alias="ac">
<link-entity name="account" from="accountid" to="ovs_siteid" link-type="inner" alias="ad">
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="parentaccountid" operator="eq"  value="@{triggerBody()['text']}"/>
</filter>
</link-entity>
</link-entity>
</entity>
</fetch>
